description: This source file contains server-side PHP functions and logic for managing parental control services, including adding, editing, and deleting managed services, port testing, conflict detection, and handling AJAX POST requests for updating device settings related to parental controls.

methods.name: PORTTEST
methods.description: Checks if either start or end port falls within the given port range, or if the range overlaps.

methods.name: time_date_conflict
methods.description: Determines whether two time/date blocks conflict based on overlapping days and times.
